= 前提 =
 * Ubuntu 12.04
 * ROS catkin workspace が ~/ros/catkinws と仮定 (違う場合は読み替えて下さい)．


= Hiro の環境を作る．=

[https://code.google.com/p/rtm-ros-robotics/wiki/hironx_ros_bridge_en?ts=1380079002&updated=hironx_ros_bridge_en#Install_via_debian_binary_%28RECOMMENDED%29 Install via debian binary (RECOMMENDED)] を実施．

[https://code.google.com/p/rtm-ros-robotics/wiki/hironx_ros_bridge_en?ts=1380079002&updated=hironx_ros_bridge_en#Working_in_a_simulator_environment Working in a simulator environment] を実施して simulator を起動．

[https://code.google.com/p/rtm-ros-robotics/wiki/hironx_ros_bridge_en?ts=1380079002&updated=hironx_ros_bridge_en#Interact_with_the_robot_via_moveIt Interact with the robot via moveIt] で MoveIt! 用の UI (RViz with MoveIt! plugin) を起動．

= planner 環境を作る =
{{{
$ cd ~/ros/catkinws/src 
$ mkdir ros-planning && cd ros-planning   (これは optional．この方がより奇麗に整理できる)
$ git clone https://github.com/ros-planning/plannerarena
}}}
